1373: Herdradus was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1373.
1384: Lost mother at the age of 11 in childbirth.
Lost mother at the age of 11.
Became caretaker of Veder, Clara, Bartrarde, Wijfgode, Folcard at age 12.
1387: Lost sibling Salomon in 1387 when Salomon was 17.
1392: Got married to Katerina at age 20 in 1392.
Herdradus moved to Slyck straet.B.0 after marriage.
1393: Had a son with Katerina, Godino, at age 20.
1394: Lost his wife Katerina while she was giving birth to Siwa in 1394.
Became caretaker of Godino, Siwa at age 22.
Got married a second time to Atghardis at age 22 in 1394.
Had Atghardis move in at Slyck straet.B.0 after marriage.
1395: Had a son with Atghardis, Herdradus, at age 22.
1396: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Aleydis, at age 23.
1397: Lost father at the age of 24.
1399: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Breghlent, at age 26.
